F

finaliseProject(Connection, Scanner) - Method in class ProjectManager
Finalizes a project by marking it as 'Finalised' in the database and setting the completion date.

G

Establishes a connection to the database.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
The main method initializes the program, establishes a database connection, and handles user interaction through a menu-driven interface.
Main - Class in Unnamed Package
The Main class serves as the entry point for the PoiseDMS project management system.
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 

P

ProjectManager - Class in Unnamed Package
ProjectManager class allows interaction with the project database to manage and manipulate project information such as adding new projects, viewing existing projects, searching projects, and viewing incomplete and overdue projects.
ProjectManager() - Constructor for class ProjectManager
 

S

searchProjects(Connection, Scanner) - Method in class ProjectManager
Allows the user to search for projects by project number or name.

T

TableFormatter - Class in Unnamed Package
Class responsible for formatting and displaying project data in a tabular format.
TableFormatter() - Constructor for class TableFormatter
 

U

updateProject(Connection, Scanner) - Method in class ProjectManager
Updates a project's details such as name and due date.
